$interpreted: Male Noble: ...The farmers in my territory have been showing signs of a possible rebellion. It is a bit difficult for me to lend out troops right now...
Female Noble: And the troops I lent out last time are all currently still recovering. If not for that, I would definitely be willing to help your Majesty out!
Fredrica: Not again~ It's practically the same excuse as the Aldric family. Are you two colluding?
Theodore: It's fine. Thanks to the assistance of fellow nobles, last time we were able to deal a critical blow to the Sunshine Infantry.
Theodore: Right now, Angelia is on her last breath. I shall personally lead the kingdom army to finish her off.

Theodore: Fellow nobles, take your time and rest well. 
I will return victorious!
Male Noble: Thank you for the consideration, your Majesty.
Female Noble: Then we shall take our leave and not continue to disturb your Majesty.

Fredrica: They talk a big talk, yet won't budge. Can't they just be honest and admit that they're freaked out by Rayzor...
Your Majesty, you sure you don't want to do a mandatory conscription?
Theodore: No need. Those spineless hacks will do me more harm than good on the battlefield. This is critical; I only trust my own men.
Theodore: Ralph, any updates on Angelia's movement?
Ralph: She is prepared to take Rayzor's core back to Sunshine Infantry.
Theodore: Ralph, keep a close eye on Hyde. Don't let him mess things up. Fredrica, take your forces and come with me. We're going to greet the princess!
Fredrica: ...*sigh*... After everything is done, I'm definitely taking my vacation leave...
Female Member: Princess, once we pass through this area, we will soon arrive at Totemtaff.
Angelia: Thank you, all of you, for escorting us here.
Female Member: Don't mention it. We've been instructed by Nigel to assist you after all.
Sherlock: I'm going back to the Bazaar. You said you'll let me go once we pass through this area!
Naya: Ok, ok, we get it! How many times do you have to bring it up!
Angelia: Guys, we're going to pick up our pace. Secure the Rayzor's core. We don't want it to get damaged!
Female Member: Yes, we're almost there. Everyone, stay close to me!
Theodore: You are not going anywhere!
Angelia: Theodore!? How the...
Elio: So this... is Theodore?
Theodore: Think you can escape my grasp? I know your every move!
Theodore: To me, you are and will always be just a little child! This is truly going to be the end. Apprehend her!
Fredrica: Alrighty~ Time to work!
Sharice: This time, I'm going make my presence felt. Eat this!
Theodore: Enough! All of you, get her!
Naya: Angel!
Angelia: Forget it, our priority is to protect the rune chariot. Let's fight our way out of here! If we lose the parts for the core, we will lose all hope!
Theodore: I already said before; you are not going anywhere!
Theodore: Every word I say is absolute! You have no choice, and cannot oppose me!
Naya: Damn it, if this keeps up...
Sherlock: Heeyyyy! I am just a random nobody! I have nothing to do with them!
Naya: ...Angel what should we do?
Theodore: Take down Angelia and the rebels!
Naya: Angel!
